short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for periodically refreshing tabs after a given interval.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension comes in a lightweight package, with a simple and intuitive interface, allowing you to automatically refresh multiple tabs after a given interval.
